gw.plugin.commission

Interface ICommission

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin, java.rmi.Remote

    public interface ICommission
extends com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin
    Interface for plugins that select a commission subplan from a given commission plan, given a policy period.

    • Method Detail

      • selectSubPlan

        CommissionSubPlan[] selectSubPlan(PolicyPeriod policyPeriod,
                                CommissionPlan commissionPlan)
        Returns a set of potential commission subplans for the given commission plan. The default implementation returns an empty array, which defers the selection to internal code. See CommissionPlan.getApplicableSubPlan(PolicyPeriod) for more information.
        Parameters:
        policyPeriod - that will be used in conjunction with the passed-in commission plan to return a set of commission subplans
        commissionPlan - for which a set of commission subplans will be returned
        Returns:
        a commission subplan, or null if internal logic should select the subplan

      • getCommissionRate

        java.math.BigDecimal getCommissionRate(PolicyCommission policyCommission,
                                     Charge charge)
        Returns a commission rate for the given PolicyCommission and charge.
        Parameters:
        policyCommission - for which the commission rate will be returned
        charge - may be null. If charge is null, then returns what the commission rate is for the policyCommission's role
        Returns:
        a commission rate

      • getNetAmountForPaymentReceivedPayableCalculator

        @Deprecated
MonetaryAmount getNetAmountForPaymentReceivedPayableCalculator(Charge charge)
        Deprecated. 8.0.0 Use shouldWriteOffActiveCommissionForChargeWrittenOff(ChargeWrittenOff) to control write-off instead.

      • shouldMakeCommissionPayable

        @Deprecated
java.lang.Boolean shouldMakeCommissionPayable(PolicyCommission policyCmsn,
                                                       MonetaryAmount amount)
        Deprecated. (Since 8.0.0) This method no longer supported
        Returns a Boolean indicating whether or not the given amount of commission should be made payable for the given PolicyCommission.
        Parameters:
        policyCmsn - PolicyCommission on which this commission will be made payable
        amount - The amount to make payable
        Returns:
        whether or not to allow this amount to become payable

      • shouldMakeCommissionPayable

        @Deprecated
java.lang.Boolean shouldMakeCommissionPayable(ItemCommission itemCmsn,
                                                       MonetaryAmount amount)
        Deprecated. (Since 8.0.0) This method no longer supported
        Returns a Boolean indicating whether or not the given amount of commission should be made payable for the given ItemCommission.
        Parameters:
        itemCmsn - ItemCommission on which this commission will be made payable
        amount - The amount to make payable
        Returns:
        whether or not to allow this amount to become payable

      • getCommissionRateOverrideDuringProducerTransferForNewPolicyCommission

        java.math.BigDecimal getCommissionRateOverrideDuringProducerTransferForNewPolicyCommission(PolicyCommission originalPolicyCommission)
        Will be called during Producer Transfer to determine the value of the Commission Rate Override in the new Policy Producer Code that is created.
        Parameters:
        originalPolicyCommission - the original Policy Producer Code (before the transfer)
        Returns:
        the desired value of the commissionRateOverridePercentage field in the new Policy Producer Code. Can be null.

      • getCustomItemCommissionAllocations

        java.util.Map<InvoiceItem,MonetaryAmount> getCustomItemCommissionAllocations(java.util.Set<ItemCommission> itemCommissions)
        Gets called during the Commissions Payable batch process for every PolicyCommission in the system using the 'Custom' payable criteria.
        Parameters:
        itemCommissions - All ItemCommissions that are available on the policy commission currently being made payable.
        Returns:
        a map of amounts to be made payable for the corresponding Invoice Item. BC will make earning transactions on each InvoiceItem for the amount given.

      • shouldWriteoffCommissionWhenProducerCodeRemoved

        boolean shouldWriteoffCommissionWhenProducerCodeRemoved(ItemCommission itemCommission)
        When we transfer an item from a PolicyCommission to a null producer code, this method tells BC whether to: - if TRUE, write off the remaining reserve for any item commissions. - if FALSE, simply override the commission rate on the old PolicyCommission to 0%, which will take back any payable or paid commission as well as all reserve.
        Parameters:
        itemCommission - ItemCommission whose commission needs to be dealt with.
        Returns:
        true if the commission should be written off instead of just overridden.

      • distributeCommissionWriteoffAcrossItemCommissions

        java.util.Map<ItemCommission,MonetaryAmount> distributeCommissionWriteoffAcrossItemCommissions(java.util.List<ItemCommission> itemCommissions,
                                                                                             MonetaryAmount writeoffAmount)
        Determines the item commission allocations for a commission write-off. This method will be passed ItemCommissions related to a ChargeCommission, excluding those ineligible for the write-off. Reversed/reversals are ineligible for write-off. ItemCommissions with payable and reserve both with a sign opposite of the write-off amount are also ineligible.
        Parameters:
        itemCommissions - ItemCommissions over which the commission writeoff should be distributed.
        writeoffAmount - Total amount to writeoff for charge
        Returns:
        Map of amounts to ItemCommissions representing the amount to be written off for each ItemCommission. The ItemCommissions must all be from the itemCommissions parameter, and the total of the amounts must equal the writeoffAmount parameter.

      • shouldWriteOffActiveCommissionForChargeWrittenOff

        boolean shouldWriteOffActiveCommissionForChargeWrittenOff(ChargeWrittenOff chargeWrittenOff)
        Parameters:
        chargeWrittenOff - the charge written off
        Returns:
        true if should write off active commission upon the event of a charge write off against the item

      • isCommissionable

        boolean isCommissionable(@Nullable
                       CommissionSubPlan commissionSubPlan,
                       Charge charge,
                       PolicyRole role)
        Determines whether or not the given charge should be given commission. Typically the answer to this question would be whether or not the charge is commissionable according to the default charge commission's policy commission's commission sub plan, unless a commission sub plan is explicitly provided, or if the charge is not a policy period charge. See CommissionSubPlan.isCommissionable(gw.bc.accounting.config.entity.ChargePattern, gw.bc.account.typekey.PolicyRole)
        Parameters:
        commissionSubPlan - optional parameter of an explicit sub plan to use, rather than getting it off of the default charge commission
        charge - The charge that we wish to check if it should be given commission
        role - The role in which to check if the given charge is commissionable
        Returns:
        True if the provided charge should be given commission
